description: Single family programs that support repairs or improvements to existing affordable single family units.  Units are counted when projects are approved for payment by HED.  Unit totals are adjusted to account for units receiving benefits from multiple HED programs.

name: Performance Metrics - Housing & Economic Development - Single Family Homes
